text: vahee hai, jisane tumhen dharatee mein adhikaar diya hai aur tumamen se kuchh ko (dhan shakti mein) doosare se kaee shreniyaan ooncha kiya hai. taaki usamen tumhaaree pareeksha[1] le, jo tumhen diya hai. vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar sheeghr hee dand dene vaala[2] hai aur vaastav mein, vah ati kshamee dayaavaan hai
